title: Incredible and charming one bed unit in a great location
posting_body: This unit is with your own slice of paradise with Ocean breeze, temperate climate and gorgeous sunshine in the highly desirable city of Long Beach.
Belmont shores adjacent, this cute & charming condo with antique touches throughout is a quick walk to the Ocean.
Hardwood Floors, cedar lined closets, charming porcelain handles on the cabinets beautiful fixtures in the bathroom.
Vintage old word windows will Endear you and make you fall in love.
With lots of cabinet space the kitchen and dinning area overlooking the court yard.
Unit with great access to the laundry area, mailbox, having ease of bringing in your groceries.
With direct access to the court yard for relaxing in the sun, this unit is perfect for anyone who enjoys Beach Living.
Water, sewer and trash included in the HOA dues.
